text:
(1)
349 Arbutus Ave., adjoining the S.E. corner of Hylan Boulevard (Huguenot), showing the Crouse house (1874 to 1898 maps).

May 14, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, as viewed from the opposite direction.

May 14, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
349 Arbutus Ave., adjoining the S.E. corner of Hylan Boulevard (Huguenot), showing the Crouse house (1874 to 1898 maps).

May 14, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, as viewed from the opposite direction.

May 14, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

361 Arbutus Ave., south of the S.E. corner of Hylan Boulevard (Huguenot). This house was occupied by Doty (1874 to 1887) and later (1898) by Stein. The dates refer to maps on which the owners'
names appear.
May 14, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
